website_summaries.verdict: A perfect starter kit for any student, home user, or professional therapist. The best value.
pros: Comes with plenty of accessories, including comfortable sheets
cons: Pad is thinner than more expensive models (but high-density foam is plenty for most)

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Terrible experience. My table broke with a client on it, after a month and had to be thrown out to make room for another table. Even with photos, the Company refused to refund the money because it couldnt be returned. Waste of money. DONT DO IT! EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Still great after 6.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February 2012, and as of October 2018 it is still in great shape. I bought this to give my wife massages and it has held up great through hundreds of uses. Not one issue to date. The padding is still in good shape, all joints still tight. I would not hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikgyver

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely gross! It arrived in a tattered box then when i opened the box as you can see the table was covered in dirt, dust and cobwebs. I’m allergic to dust so i instantly had a reaction and broke out in hives. I’m sure a few spiders crawled out of there. I’m extremely disappointed at the condition of this table
customer_reviews.author: Jakia Q.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Solid, steady, holds body weight well. I'm not a professional, but still use this table almost daily and haven't had any problems either with safety or stability. Nicely adjustable, and folds up fairly easily. For home massage use it works great. I've tried rocking it around with my own weight but it's plenty solid so I'm pretty confident just focusing on the massage and not worrying about the table.
customer_reviews.author: Emacdo

customer_reviews.title: this is a great table. Assembles pretty easily and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great table. Assembles pretty easily and holds up well. A bit bigger than I like, but the padding is the bulk of it (which I want). Fun to use with the fiancé. Still waiting for my turn for a massage. P.S. Someone has to invent a better face pad. No one has a truly comfortable one as far as I can tell. This one is not bad, it is just rough when you lay face first for a while as every single one I have ever used does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile massage therapist, I am used to carrying my equipment. When it was time to invest in a new table, I chose this one because of the accessories and the boast about it being light weight. This table is VERY heavy and unwieldy, and not at all what I thought it would be. The "sheet" included barely qualifies, and the table cover has a hole in it after using it twice. Not worth the single star I was required to click. Ridiculous set, not at all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Principessa

customer_reviews.title: Stable, sturdy and rugged
customer_reviews.text: We have given each other massages on the floor. After getting the massage table we have experienced a much deeper massage, less stressful, more versatile and relaxing. I would this massage table. It is very stable and can be adjusted to the height that is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: rev don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent message table
customer_reviews.text: I got it today and I must say that its way better then i thought. I gave my husband massage for an hour. He loved how comfortable the table was. He weight about 200 lbs. This table is well worth every pennie. Im more then happy with it and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!-CMT
customer_reviews.text: Im soooooo happy with it. My only thing is putting pieces back in the straps just does not make sense to me on any table lol. Id rather have pouches or something. But i think all tables only have straps. The carrying bag is nice with a medium sz front pocket! Package came with a cheap little linen set that was a pleasant surprise. I was able to make bolster fit in to The bag although theres no intended space for it really. The table cushion is quite comfy. Btw im 270 lbs and i fit comfy on there and its stable. Its an upgrade from my first one for sure! Such a great buy! great value! Really great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can roll right up when giving a Reiki treatment. Clients love the wide width and arm rests.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Speed-Wood

customer_reviews.title: Won't ever purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: After very few uses, one of the latches completely fell off, so it can't be closed securely. The back is cheap and also fell apart quickly. The legs are not very sturdy. There is a lot of wiggle when it's set up. The passing is fair though. Another case of you get what you pay for. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: k. ray

customer_reviews.title: as useful as a chocolate  fan in 100 degrees
customer_reviews.text: This broke the first time someone got on it and they weren't even that big - this incident resulted in a person with eating disorders going home with an extra dose of it..... I looked like a total cretin as this table broke the safe space. this is a terrible product....... looks good but is as useful as a chocolate fan in 100 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: M Fiennes

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great table!!! I was very pleased with it! Took it out of the box, opened it up, ready to go!! Great quality, sturdy, nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry corder

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great table used for facials couldn't be any more pleased
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table and this was in my budget. The people I am practicing on have commented that the table is hard, so I am working to solve that issue. My kids really enjoy receiving a massage on the table. I love the bolster (half bolster), as I do not like full size bolsters - I find them too large. I am not sure how the arm sling is supposed to hang, and I have not put the arm holders on the side or used the hanging bar. I like what I have and will upgrade once I'm out of massage school. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kendell

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table. Works well. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bargersville shopper

customer_reviews.title: better than I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I bought this. It is easy to assemble and has a lot of great features. It was delivered quickly and was exactly as the seller described. I don't know how well it would hold up for commercial use (i.e. several hours every day), but it is perfect for a practitioner working from a home office. I mostly use mine for reiki, but it has everything you need for massage therapy.
customer_reviews.author: rosegirlxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sturdy and best of all pretty. Not a hot pink very soft. All of the attachment are easy to use. Fold up like a briefcase . Customers love it
customer_reviews.author: Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Was a great investment. We've had this for 5 years now and still does the job. The only issue I have is the wear and tear of the material on the actual table and headrest piece.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Good looking table that seems sturdy and well built. A little longer than a standard table. I've only used it a few times, but so far so good. The face rest doesn't adjust as much as I would like it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It turned out to be a very nice table, a little heavier then I expected but made well. When I did a reiki treatment on my father he thought it was much more comfortable than it looked. By the time I was done with the treatment he was sound asleep, which tells you a lot, as he never sleeps on his back. One problem that came up was the extra parts under the table which are held in place by elastic bands do not stay put, so that the different parts (arm rest, head rest, etc.) keep falling out when I open it. It was worth the money and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn M Benson

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how pleased I was with this table. I don't use it often, and I would probably hesitate to use it for a lot of clients every day, but for my needs, it is perfect. It seems sturdy and well made. The carry case looks good, but the zipper goes only halfway down the sides. That can make putting the table into the bag a bit tricky. However, as I said, I don't have to do that very often. It is comfortable to lie on and looks good. A GREAT value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to everyone!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter needed and it had so many extra’s. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Makes exercising much easier more frequently
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well worth the$$ to not have to figure how to get up without setting off back
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Grace

customer_reviews.title: This is great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This is great for occasional use. Sturdy, compact when stored, and a great value. I was hopeful that all the accessories would be great, too, but please note that the SHEETS WILL SHRINK. I wasn't expecting them to be great, but I did expect them to be able to be washed and dried and reused. This was not the case. The seller would not replace the defective item either - that part was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos/Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well built. Fantastic quality for a most reasonable price. It is wider than our other one, therefore much more comfortable. The size allows us to do many more things than on a narrower table.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great table, holds my hubby perfectly, he says it's really comfy, it came looking way better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use for wife - perfect for that.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife's 40th birthday. I only plan on using it at home for her - and if that's what you're looking to do, this is the table for you. Why pay double to get a professional one if you're not a professional? It works, it's comfortable. If you're a professional - get a pro one. This is for home use IMO, and it's great for that so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Used for over 6 months, all different weights of clientele and it is very comfy. I have even napped on it several times, haha! .Folds up and sets up easily. Carrying cover is nice too. I plan to purchase a second one for the next studio I open.
customer_reviews.author: L M

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a clients’ personal use every couple of week. I don’t think it would hold up to daily professional use.It is also difficult to fold the face cradle and arm rests inside it, but she says it is very comfortable to lay on and the side arm extensions are a great feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for price paid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy Massage table. It is comfortable, easy to set up, and has head and arm rest acessories. The legs are adjustable and strong. One of my friends weights 240 lbs, and the table is very stable upon his getting on and off. I have recommended this table to several of my friends. The bag that comes with this table is easy to put on and take off, and has a wide sturdy adjustable carrying strap.
customer_reviews.author: Daveo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, but you’ll need other sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table, but it comes with worthless sheets. That’s the only reason I docked a star. You will need an extra set of sheets- go with some flannels.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only "issue" is there's not a thing to hold that protective paper you put on the bed for waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Hours after I got it I had set it up to be used and took it down with little to no problem. The biggest would have been the elastics inside to hold the attachments are hard to use when the table is on its side but if laid flat it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Littler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to assemble and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: We love the table and the ease of use and storing is simple.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: attachments are junk
customer_reviews.text: wobbly, side arm isn't where a client's arms would normally be, hole for face is stupid and keeps falling out, place for arms attached to face cradle awkward to put on and tangles when I put face cradle in. It is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March and broke in June. Contacted the seller and he said it only comes with 30 days warranty and he can't do anything about it. I don't recommend this if you are planning to use it for more than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: DenXpert

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for lashing
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for lashing. Love how easy it is to put away
customer_reviews.author: Yesmith

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed; stable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed; stable; good size for portability but sturdy for bigger people - with sensible discretion; easy to set up;thoughtful extras; lower price than used ones for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to give my girlfriend massages. She is a semi-professional athlete and works hard. This table was the perfect gift. It is easily portable, easily adjustable, supportive and comfortable, and has held up well after three years of use. Easily one of the best Amazon purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: David Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great massage chair for the price! Not the most comfortable, but has to be expected given the price.
customer_reviews.author: breana

customer_reviews.title: Basic but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy to move around if you are taking it to other people's homes. The bag is awkward to hold and my handle broke the second time using it. The table is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of this table. It was easy to set up, and is lightweight enough for me to carry easily. The table arrived on time and in excellent condition. I use it as a table for my physical therapy exercises, too. Since we live in a cold climate I also ordered a heated fleece pad to put under the sheet. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than what we could have expected. It is very sturdy, extra wide, and comfortable to lay on. The seller deliverable this product to us some 4 or 5 days ahead of the expected date which is fantastic! Thank you for that and for selling such a great massage table with plenty of accessories.
customer_reviews.author: ALE

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best money ever spent!! Once a week we turn it into a spa and can relax and completely unwind. This table is so much sturdier than I thought! Would definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christa B

customer_reviews.title: Sheets don't fit
customer_reviews.text: The sheets that came with it are SO CHEAP, they don't even fit on the table even with my husband helping me stretch them to fit, they just pop right off, they're about 4" too short. It seems pretty strong though, doesn't wobble. I expected a bit more for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: IT Wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. Not as wide as some, but plenty wide for my clients. Love the head cradle.
customer_reviews.author: belle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to set up. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to maneuver if your petite
customer_reviews.text: The table is heavier than I expected. Additionally, the cushions are difficult to store and close the table. The head piece tension has already not working properly. I’m am not real happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: tara rose

customer_reviews.title: Love this table.
customer_reviews.text: For occasional use at home, this has been a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy massage table.
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas gift I’ve ever received. We both use it... a lot. Good for a quick 10 min point specific massage or a 60 min relaxation massage.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Rie

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a casual user
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a masseuse, so I cannot comment on its commercial viability, but for my personal purposes, this table is quite nice. Easy to fold/unfold, and has everything you'd need included.
customer_reviews.author: SaakM

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have had 2 of these tables for 2 years; they both get used for about 10 massages a week. One of the tables is still in really great shape. The other is developing quite a bit of wear/warping in the middle of the padding down the center. The tables are comfortable and sturdy. The head cradle needs adjusted about every 4 months. Would probably buy again, but definitely not as good quality as my Oakworks table.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H

customer_reviews.title: Super.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write the review till after some heavy use. It has been half a year now and I love love love it. Easy up, Easy down, light enough for me, and still sturdy. I have had some BIG clients on this table. Accessories and all, I'd say great value. It was priced low so I expected it to break, and waited, and waited. But it's holding up and i'd recommend to anyone who needs a portable.
customer_reviews.author: elliott

customer_reviews.title: The massage table itself is absolutely perfect. Came with everything just like it says
customer_reviews.text: The massage table itself is absolutely perfect. Came with everything just like it says, and seems well made and nicely put together. I would just recommend that you give yourself lots and lots of time to get this item. I had some issues with the company since they did not send it out originally, but charged me for it. But when I complained, they finally took care of it and it was sent out soon after. In all took about a month to receive the table, so the service was a bit slow. But the table itself is great. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Norrander

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few years now, and it has been great! It's not professional quality, but works great for at home massages! Very comfortable and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Nellybelly333

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It's great value for the price and my healing massage clients think it's comfortable. I'm a Tibetan Tantra instructor and I focus on teaching meditation and helping men heal themselves of PE and ED. Visit [...] for more details on my practice and one on one coaching sessions!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: coming apart at the edges. haven't even used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: The table is wonderful. My clients love the extra padded surface
customer_reviews.text: Have this over a year now and my only issue is the weak straps on the carrying case. Broke off almost immediately. The table is wonderful. My clients love the extra padded surface.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Weise

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: did not come with the sheets and rolled pillows was suposed to get 40.00 credit but have not seen it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Massage Table
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great value for the money. I've had for nearly one year and no problems at all. Great design in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but heavy. Now my back doesn't hurt to give massages to my wife on the bed on my knees leaning over anymore. However, massage hints from my wife have gone up 400%.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality, comfort and sturdiness of this table. Used it twice in the first 3 days. Very easy to adjust height. Very happy with the purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: phil Gossman

customer_reviews.title: but I like the table a lot
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I use it mostly for my physical therapy exercises because it is so much easier to get on and off of than the floor. I do not travel with it, but I like the table a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wise

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great deal for the price I use this all the time with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A Good Table For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this to be a super high-quality table, but for the price it's pretty good. The table does seem a little off balance when people are getting on and off, so you just have to make sure that they don't move too quickly on or off the table. Other than that it seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Plesantly Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The table is what I expected it to be. The initial set-up was fairly easy... although the directions could have been a little better. It felt like it weighed more than 40-lbs... but, I'm a guy, so I guess I won't complain about that. I was pleasantly pleased... and can't wait to get my first client.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not well put together.
customer_reviews.text: The self for your arms broke away. Was able to fix with new straps, staples and glue. Cheaply put together. Should not have fallen apart so easily. (on second use .. used in home by 130 lb man and 120 lb woman)
customer_reviews.author: Josie Harlow

customer_reviews.title: we love the table and its portableness
customer_reviews.text: we love the table and its portableness. It pretty sturdy for the price I paid. We're happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the $$$ and the quality ain't bad n'either!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the $$$. You get totally functional Massage Table for a fraction of the competitors cost. I have 3 friends that ordered it after seeing it in the flesh. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Cerises

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable massage table
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made product and a good price for the money. The 27" wide model is quite adequate as a 30" wide one would be too big for a normal person. I don't find that the arm protrusions are very useful, but they were easy to take out.
customer_reviews.author: Armchair Shopper

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Rickety, had to replace dowel on wing. Will use for out door events only so I don't care if it gets damaged. And most runners are light and I won't worry about load capacity. Very rickety when average size to mildly heavy person turning over.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Yutsus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the quality of the bed isn't that bad either
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Massage table
customer_reviews.text: Loved this as soon as I took it out of the box. Very durable, liked all of the attachments that came with it. Easy to set up, and for the price I thought this was an excellent deal. Can't wait to give my girl a massage!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nicest table I've ever bought. All components are applicable to enhancing massage experience and store back easily. Very light weight, durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! Use my table a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my table. Use it very often, fold it out when I don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table, terrible sheet
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, easy to open up and add and subtract parts. Very professional. Sheet is terrible and shrank after 1 wash and now does not fit the table.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchi

customer_reviews.title: Won't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Folds up and down easily. we are 210 -275 pounds and is stable. Worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love my table! It was exactly what I was looking for and you can't beat the price! Very sturdy, comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT ! I added a table warmer, nice soft bedding, music, spa environment and it makes me want to live in there !
customer_reviews.author: KIKILYN

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: bed is absolutely beautiful! ITs a bit big but whose complaining!
customer_reviews.author: William S Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great table for price!
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy & nice looking! Folds up nicely! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Danigirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing couldn't be much easier to use. It seems like its made of quality materials (for the price) and has served my fiance and I well. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material and well made. We’ve used it 5 times now and it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Polk

customer_reviews.title: The best massage table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, massage table elborada high quality materials , is quite large , much more than the several local generic tables on the market . Easy to assemble and store. A little heavy for transfers. It is super stable to be a portable table. The cover that brings is poor though it is not important. It is recommended 1000 % would buy other more .
customer_reviews.author: Alexander More

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the massage table. Very sturdy and professional looking. Adjustable heights are great, but if you have it set at the highest two heights (which we like) then the legs are too long to fold for storage! Not a problem if you keep it up all the time, but could be an issue for a tall person who plans to carry it from place to place. But if you plan to simply leave it set up in your home it's an excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: John Cahill

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the massage table. It is perfect for what I need it for doing some facials at home. It's light weight if I choose to take to a friends house as well.
customer_reviews.author: DRM1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, wellmade, withstands the test of time. I purchased this several years ago
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my table and my clients have said it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my table and my clients have said it is very comfortable. I would like to purchase additional fitted sheets with the hole in the top portion of the table. Could you please let me know how I can do that? I would really appreciate it. I could not find a phone number and the only sheets I found did not have the opening. Thanks, Sandra Gibbs
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: We love this massage table
customer_reviews.text: We love this massage table. It is nice and sturdy. Easy to fold and store, or carry off on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smith

customer_reviews.title: IAMSKILLZ
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price and for what's included. However the weight of the table is not practical. This is a beginners table. I wasn't impressed with the craftsmanship or durability of the materials used for the legs and headrest. Overall, I feel like I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: IAMSKILLZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice, sturdy table. Could not beat the price and free shipping to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviews that have commented on the low price without sacrificing quality, I would have to agree 100%. This table is portable, not too heavy (about 40 lbs) and folds with ease. I purchased the black massage table and it looks beautiful. It's very comfortable and absolutely gets the job done. Be sure to review the specs for length/width so that it matches what you are looking for. I'm new to this whole massage thing, but this table was just as good, if not better then the ones I used in class. I highly recommend this product for it's comfort, convenience, ease of use and price.
customer_reviews.author: Foosball Master
